General.Name: BlackRock MIT II
General.Description: BlackRock Municipal Income Trust II is a closed ended fixed income mutual fund launched by BlackRock, Inc. It is managed by BlackRock Advisors, LLC. The fund invests in fixed income markets. It primarily invests long-term and short-term investments, and money market funds. The fund primarily in investment grade municipal bonds that are exempt from regular federal income tax. BlackRock Municipal Income Trust II was formed on July 30, 2002 and is domiciled in United States.
